com.ncl.team20.seatonvalley.components.mail

Class Mail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ncl.team20.seatonvalley.components.mail.Mail

  • class Mail
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to create a Mail Object for ReportActivity and ContactActivity. Creates the Send Mail object and the Verification Mail Object. Used Gmail as an SMPT provider,and used a 2-pass verification then generated an app password for this application in order to avoid suspicious activities when other devices from various places.

    Last Edit: 22/03/2018 by Stelios Ioannou

    Documentation Edit: 22/04/2018 by Alex Peebles

    Since:
    20/02/2018
    See Also:
    Session, MimeMessage, Properties, SendMail, ContactActivity, ReportActivity
